types.html:
haut du panier m (uncountable)

  1. the best of the bunch, the pick of the litter, the cream of the crop, the upper crust, the top of the barrel
    Synonyms: dessus du panier, crème, crème de la crème, gratin, ce qu'il y a de mieux
    Antonym: fond du panier
trans: the best of the bunch, the pick of the litter, the cream of the crop, the upper crust, the top of the barrel
the best of the bunch, the pick of the litter, the cream of the crop, the upper crust, the top of the barrel
the best of the bunch, the pick of the litter, the cream of the crop, the upper crust, the top of the barrel
